name: 王正豪
objective: 本課程之設計，在介紹學生資訊安全的概念，並瞭解相關的技術與應用。本課程包括下列主題：資訊安全簡介、傳統加密法、私鑰加密技術、公鑰加密技術與雜湊函數、訊息認證編碼與協定、認證系統、電子郵件安全技術、網際網路協定安全技術、全球資訊網安全技術、系統安全技術、防火牆系統等。
schedule:
0. Ch.1 Introduction (1 wk)
1. Cryptography: Ch. 2-3 (3-4 wks)
- Symmetric encryption and message confidentiality
- Public-key cryptography and message authentication 
2. Network security applications: Ch. 4-8 (7-8 wks)
- Key distribution and user authentication
- Transport-level security
- Wireless network security
- Electronic mail security
- IP security
3. Midterm Exam (1 wk)
4. System security: Ch. 9-11 (4-5 wks)
- Intruders
- Malicious software
- Firewalls
5. Final Exam (1 wk)
scorePolicy:
Written homeworks: ~25%
Programming exercises: ~30%
Midterm & final exams: ~45%
materials:
- Textbook: Network Security Essentials: Applications and Standards, 5th ed., by William Stallings, Pearson Education, Inc., 2013. (International Edition, 開發)
. http://williamstallings.com/NetworkSecurity/ 

- References:

. Some slides and papers
